thread.title: Narendra Modi in Chhapra: PM takes a dig at Nitish Kumar for taantrik fiasco
thread.title_full: Narendra Modi in Chhapra: PM takes a dig at Nitish Kumar for taantrik fiasco

author: Sakshita Khosla
title: Narendra Modi in Chhapra: PM takes a dig at Nitish Kumar for taantrik fiasco
text: Narendra Modi in Chhapra: PM takes a dig at Nitish Kumar for taantrik fiasco By Sakshita Khosla on October 25, 2015 at 1:37 PM Comments Patna, October 25 : Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday partook in the pleasures of mocking his biggest rival in the ongoing Bihar Assembly Elections, while addressing a rally in Bihar’s Chhapra. Modi took a dig at Chief Minister Nitish Kumar after his video with a tantric surfaced online earlier this week, saying that the tantric was the fourth biggest force in the Grand Alliance. The video that had been uploaded by BJP leader Giriraj Singh and which showed the tantric chiding Nitish for aligning himself with Rashtriya Janata Dal chief Lalu Prasad Yadav. In the video, the tantric could be seen praising Nitish Kumar and chanting anti Lalu slogans. Also Read: Live Narendra Modi Mann Ki Baat Updates: PM says “Shanti, Sadbhavana and Ekta” are key to progress Narendra Modi did not hold back in cracking jokes at the expense of Nitish Kumar. He said,”.. mujhe pehli baar pata chala ye Mahaswarthbandhan mein sirf 3 partner nahin hai, chaar khilaadi hain. Ek Lalu ji, Nitish ji, Madam Sonia ji aur chautha taantrik.” (This is the first time that I came to know that in this Mahaswarthbandhan there are four players- Lalu, Nitish, Madam Sonia and the fourth Taantrik!) Ye Mahagathbandhan mein jo Mahaswarthbandhan hai, iss mein teen khilaadi hain, ek bade bhai, ek chote bhai, ek Madam: PM Modi
